text: Because six - pack mom and model Sarah Stage, 33, worked out H - A - R - D while she was pregnant with her second child, who was born on Monday, she received lots of critique from fans who voiced concerns over her fitness routine and its effects on her baby's health. Still, Sarah assured her followers all along that her doctor approved her for exercise, and her baby was doing F - I - N - E. Yesterday, the mom posted her first family - of - four photo featuring Logan Alexander, her adorable baby boy who came out healthy and weighing 7 pounds, 2 ounces â€” with a full head of hair to boot.
